channel.title: [PI] Need help with SQL Hiscores [PI]
channel.description:
[left][pre][center]Okay i have followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html
[center][b] I Need help with the following:[/b][/center]
[ul][li]You also have to declare SQL's package (In SQL class) package server.util;[/li]
[li]import server.model.players.Client;And at the top of Client class and Server class import SQL class import server.util.SQL;
[/li][li]Put SQL class in the util folder, in SQL class change saveHighScore(client clientToSave) to saveHighScore(Client clientToSave) Project Insanity's Server class doesn't have a run method, so put SQL.createConnection(); in the main method public static void main(java.lang.String args[])[/li][/ul] [/center][/left]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Here are the compile errors:
src\server\model\players\Client.java:9: cannot find symbol symbol : class SQL location: package server.util import server.util.SQL; ^ src\server\Server.java:13: cannot find symbol symbol : class SQL location: package server.util import server.util.SQL; ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:646: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class server.model.players.Client SQL.saveHighScore(this); ^ src\server\Server.java:97: cannot find symbol symbol : variable SQL location: class server.Server SQL.createConnection(); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[center]I just need help with them, Please contact me on the website or PM me thanks [/color][/center]

item.title: [PI] Need help with SQL Hiscores [PI]

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You forgot the import server.util.SQL; and you dont have the SQL file added to server I don’t think.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Need help with SQL Hiscores [PI]
item.dc:creator: @king-of-pvp king-of-pvp
item.description:
@king-of-pvp wrote:

[left][pre][center]Okay i have followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html

[center] I Need help with the following:[/center]

[ul][li]You also have to declare SQL’s package (In SQL class)
package server.util;[/li]

[li]import server.model.players.Client;And at the top of Client class and Server class import SQL class
import server.util.SQL;

[/li][li]Put SQL class in the util folder, in SQL class change saveHighScore(client clientToSave) to saveHighScore(Client clientToSave)
Project Insanity’s Server class doesn’t have a run method, so put SQL.createConnection(); in the main method
public static void main(java.lang.String args[])[/li][/ul]
[/center][/left]

Here are the compile errors:

src\server\model\players\Client.java:9: cannot find symbol
symbol  : class SQL
location: package server.util
import server.util.SQL;
                  ^
src\server\Server.java:13: cannot find symbol
symbol  : class SQL
location: package server.util
import server.util.SQL;
                  ^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:646: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable SQL
location: class server.model.players.Client
                            SQL.saveHighScore(this);
                            ^
src\server\Server.java:97: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable SQL
location: class server.Server
        SQL.createConnection();
        ^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

[center]I just need help with them, Please contact me on the website or PM me thanks
[/color][/center]

Read full topic
